summary: 2007 TOYOTA PRIUS. DRIVER'S SIDE HEADLIGHT GOES OFF INTERMITTENTLY. FIRST IT BECOMES DIM, THEN COMPLETELY GOES OUT. IF I TURN THE LIGHT SWITCH OFF AND ON IT WILL GO BACK ON FOR A SHORT TIME, BUT THEN GOES OFF AGAIN. FIRST NOTICED THE PROBLEM DRIVING ON HIGHWAY AT NIGHT DURING A RAIN STORM AND HAD DIFFICULTY SEEING.  *TR
